Name: Seek Girl:Fog Ⅰ
About the game: 'Seek Girl: Fog I' is a strategy adventure game where you will rescue trapped girls in the mysterious fog. The suddenly appearing mist in the Kingdom Forest trapped the girls in it, and the mysterious power eroded the Kingdom continuously. You are a warrior recruited by the king to rescue the lost girl. With the adventure in the mist, you will slowly unlock the secret of the mist and the huge conspiracy hidden behind it. Be careful of the crippling monsters and traps in the mist, remember to move and move again! 'Seek Girl: Fog I' is a brand new chapter in the seek girl series. Unprecedented storyline. Many cute and sexy girls waiting for rescue. The new true professional voice actors line-up dubbing (with headphones to better!). All characters live2d are upgraded again. Fun and creative gameplay Understand the plot, solve the mystery, unlock hidden characters and different endings. The needs of gentlemen are our only constant mission. Other game series recommended by the developer: SeeKgirl Ⅰ-Ⅵ ，Lost，Taboos: Cracks，Rebirth:Mr Wang
